TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SubscriptionManager extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: SubscriptionManager is the application interface to SubscriptionController and provides information about the current Telephony Subscriptions.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(native int javaReference, valuetype Android.Runtime.JniHandleOwnership transfer) cil managed

To be added.
Docs.summary: To be added.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the SubscriptionInfo(s) of all embedded subscriptions accessible to the calling app, if any.
Docs.value:
Sorted list of the current embedded SubscriptionInfo records available on the device which are accessible to the caller.
  • If null is returned the current state is unknown but if a OnSubscriptionsChangedListener has been registered OnSubscriptionsChangedListener#onSubscriptionsChanged will be invoked in the future.
  • If the list is empty then there are no SubscriptionInfo records currently available.
  • if the list is non-empty the list is sorted by SubscriptionInfo#getSimSlotIndex then by SubscriptionInfo#getSubscriptionId.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: The default sms subscription has changed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: The default subscription has changed.

Docs.summary: Get active data subscription id.
Docs.value: Active data subscription id if any is chosen, or SubscriptionManager.INVALID_SUBSCRIPTION_ID if not.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Requires Permission: android.Manifest.permission#READ_PHONE_STATE READ_PHONE_STATE or that the calling app has carrier privileges (see TelephonyManager#hasCarrierPrivileges).
Docs.value: the current number of active subscriptions. There is no guarantee the value returned by this method will be the same as the length of the list returned by #getActiveSubscriptionInfoList.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: To be added.
Docs.value: the maximum number of active subscriptions that will be returned by #getActiveSubscriptionInfoList and the value returned by #getActiveSubscriptionInfoCount.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Get the SubscriptionInfo(s) of the currently active SIM(s).
Docs.value:
Sorted list of the currently SubscriptionInfo records available on the device.
  • If null is returned the current state is unknown but if a OnSubscriptionsChangedListener has been registered OnSubscriptionsChangedListener#onSubscriptionsChanged will be invoked in the future.
  • If the list is empty then there are no SubscriptionInfo records currently available.
  • if the list is non-empty the list is sorted by SubscriptionInfo#getSimSlotIndex then by SubscriptionInfo#getSubscriptionId.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
